articles.description: Yesterday, I talked about the new exotic armor pieces in Destiny 2’s Season of Plunder, and while we also have two weapons, Delicate Tomb and the return of Touch of Malice, what if I told you the best exotic weapon this season is actually four years old?

articles.title: Older Samsung Galaxy foldables and smartwatches are getting new features - The Verge
articles.description: Updating to the latest version of One UI will include features such as multitasking gestures, optimizations for large-screened devices, first-party app enhancements and a PC-like taskbar.
articles.content:
One UI 4.1.1 will roll out to Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 devices first
The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 is getting some Z Flip 4 features.
